data.title: Movies directed by Henri-Georges Clouzot
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies directed by Henri-Georges Clouzot, including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:
Diabolique

Floating around the art house circuit these days is a restored version of Henri-Georges Clouzot's 1955 murder mystery, Diabolique. Easily overlooked because of its limited re-release distribution, this picture may demand some active searching to u...

Wages of Fear

Legendary filmmaker Henri-Georges Clouzot has often been referred to as the "French Hitchcock." Indeed, Clouzot is best known for his 1955 movie, Diabolique, which is widely regarded as one of the most surprising and disturbing psychological thril...
